channel.title: Sara's Cook Book
channel.description: Recent content on Sara's Cook Book

item.title: Eggless Vanilla Sponge Cake
item.description: Eggless Blueberry Vanilla Cake without condensed milk.

item.title: Ice Cream without ice cream maker
item.description: Ice Cream-no machine needed! Rich and creamy ice cream with just three ingredients.

item.title: Paruppu Podi
item.description: Paruppu podi is a very simple and easy recipe that comes handy when we do not want to spend much time in cooking. You can make these podis in bulk during week ends and store it in air tight container.

item.title: Ginger - Benefits
item.description: Ginger is a potent aromatic herb and a good natural source of vitamin C, magnesium, potassium, copper, and manganese.
